info.abstract:
[Type] Management.
[Behaviour] Start and stop a cluster of I/O servers.
[Parameters] - action : use one of the following types: "start": try to reserve hosts and starts I/O servers (default); "stop": stop reservation and I/O servers. - nhosts : number of hosts to be reserved as well as number of I/O servers to be started over them. - host_partition : name of user-defined partition to be used to group hosts.
[System parameters] - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output). cancel : show result data as text.
[Examples] Start 3 I/O servers: OPH_TERM: oph_cluster nhosts=3;host_partition=cluster; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_io_server;nhosts=3;host_partition=cluster;"
